Run an Actor and get dataset1.textTranslated: The place is nice, but it lacks some amenities, such as a clothes rack, rusty kitchen utensils, and a very hard bed that not everyone can sleep on. I also wished the bathtub was warm, but it's very cold. There's no water heater.

Run an Actor and get dataset1.textTranslated: Beware, beware of booking this! It's the worst, dirtiest, and oldest chalet, and on top of that, the service is awful. Don't be fooled by the Instagram deals; the chalet is terrible in every way. Most importantly, they won't refund your security deposit; they'll make up some problem to take it. The chairs and bed are stained and old, the sink doesn't have a heating system, the kitchen utensils are old and rusty, and they haven't even provided a knife. There's no barbecue area. In short, it's terrible in every way, and on top of that, they'll steal your security deposit.
Run an Actor and get dataset1.title: Ayana Chalet

Run an Actor and get dataset1.textTranslated:
Poor treatment of guests and failure to respond to visitor messages.

Run an Actor and get dataset1.title: Ayana Chalet

Run an Actor and get dataset1.text: Excellent session by Dr misha physiotherapist. I get a good relief from pain in just one session. I recommend it for everyone as it is a home health care, and makes your life easy.
Run an Actor and get dataset1.address: Warsan Tower - Office 508 - Barsha Heights - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
Run an Actor and get dataset1.title: City Doctorâ„¢

Run an Actor and get dataset1.text: Tried there services and the booking process was very smooth, team was at door on time with all the medications and vitamins.
Run an Actor and get dataset1.address: Warsan Tower - Office 508 - Barsha Heights - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
Run an Actor and get dataset1.title: City Doctorâ„¢

Run an Actor and get dataset1.text:
AVOID THEM AT ALL COSTS

They should be reported to the DHA for their conduct. I'm in considerably more pain after their physiotherapy, like my health has actually deteriorated worse than before their therapy, and neither the therapist nor their WhatsApp contact wants to even take accountability. I've had intense muscle pain, nerve pain, nausea, mild dizziness, referred pain in other parts, all after one treatment session and everytime I've reported this to them, they've gaslit me by saying it's normal or if it's too much, I should go see a doctor (they're literally doctors!). They sent a GP (Dr. Shoaib) to follow up the next day because I complained of severe pain, who barely examined the area I showed was hurting, and said if it was serious, I'd be dead by now. Additionally the actual problem that had to be addressed never fully left either. Everytime I've brought this up with them since then, they've said things like I should just exercise (again, my body is in literal pain), or very diplomatically said they won't do anything about it since they already performed the grand gesture of sending a GP to follow up. And yes, they've actually abandoned the treatment. The pain I've had the past few days, I wouldn't wish it on my worst enemy, and the very people who've caused it and call themselves healthcare professionals are doing nothing about it because it can incriminate them. The poor quality of care aside, the indifference from the customer care team would get them sued in other places!

UPDATE: Since they've been ignoring my calls and messages, another health service had to intervene yesterday and in fact confirmed that their PT didn't do a proper job and that their GP didn't identify the problem. The new PT and GP confirmed I was experiencing very high blood pressure (needed an IV to stabilize), dizziness, and excessive referred pain through the nerve and the muscular system due to what the City Doctor team had done. They also hadn't administered any proper aftercare which is important in these situations. If you value your life and health, choose another service.
Run an Actor and get dataset1.responseFromOwnerText:
Thank you for your feedback. We understand recovery from a long-standing chronic condition can be frustrating, especially when immediate results are expected after a single physiotherapy session.

Our DHA-licensed GP and physiotherapist followed up as per protocol and identified no urgent concerns. You opted not to continue the recommended plan.

While we donâ€™t promise miracle cures in one visit, we consistently deliver safe, ethical healthcare, reflected by the many patients who complete their treatment journey with us.

We note you have since shifted to another provider. Based on your reviewing history, we sincerely hope they donâ€™t receive the same 1-star outcome very soon.

â€” City Doctor Team
Run an Actor and get dataset1.address: Warsan Tower - Office 508 - Barsha Heights - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
Run an Actor and get dataset1.title: City Doctorâ„¢

Run an Actor and get dataset1.text:
Exceptional service! City Doctor Home Healthcare provides top-notch medical care in the comfort of your own home.
The staff is professional, compassionate, and truly dedicated to improving your health. Highly recommended!
Run an Actor and get dataset1.address: Warsan Tower - Office 508 - Barsha Heights - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
Run an Actor and get dataset1.title: City Doctorâ„¢

Run an Actor and get dataset1.text: Compassionate and professional home health care  . The team arrived very fast . Highly recommended

Run an Actor and get dataset1.title: City Doctorâ„¢

They should be reported to the DHA for their conduct. I'm in considerably more pain after their physiotherapy, like my health has actually deteriorated worse than before their therapy, and neither the therapist nor their WhatsApp contact wants to even take accountability. I've had intense muscle pain, nerve pain, nausea, mild dizziness, referred pain in other parts, all after one treatment session and everytime I've reported this to them, they've gaslit me by saying it's normal or if it's too much, I should go see a doctor (they're literally doctors!). Code in JavaScript4.summary: City Doctorâ„¢ is the clear winner, boasting significantly higher scores (4.9 vs 3.1) and an overwhelmingly larger volume of reviews (1201 vs 17), indicating a far more established market presence and generally positive customer perception. While Ayana Chalet faces critical foundational issues, City Doctorâ„¢'s challenge lies in managing severe adverse events and maintaining accountability.
Code in JavaScript4.recommendation: For a competitor, this analysis underscores two critical lessons: first, foundational operational excellenceâ€”including cleanliness, proper amenities, and honest dealingsâ€”is non-negotiable for customer satisfaction and reputation, as Ayana Chalet's severe challenges demonstrate. Second, while scale and high scores are beneficial, an ironclad protocol for handling adverse events, ensuring transparent accountability, and providing empathetic customer support (especially in sensitive fields like healthcare) is paramount to mitigate severe reputational damage, as City Doctorâ„¢'s extensive negative review painfully illustrates.
strengthsB: High convenience and accessibility through home healthcare services
Effective treatment and pain relief for a large customer base
weaknessesA: Severe lack of cleanliness and poor maintenance (e.g., dirty, old, rusty items, stained furniture)
Absence of essential amenities and features (e.g., no clothes hangers, cold pool, no BBQ area, lack of privacy)
Poor customer service and integrity issues (e.g., bad treatment, unresponsiveness, alleged security deposit theft)
weaknessesB: Risk of severe medical malpractice and adverse treatment outcomes (e.g., significant pain increase, misdiagnosis, lack of proper aftercare)
Poor accountability and customer service for adverse events (e.g., gaslighting, indifference, abandonment of treatment, ignoring complaints)
Inadequate follow-up and potential for misdiagnosis during critical situations

body.currentText:
A B A N O U B M O H S E N A B B A S
Medical Sales Representative | Sales and Operation Specialist
+971544416134 | abanoub.mohsen789@gmail.com | Dubai, UAE | UAE Driving License | Work Visa
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Highly results-driven Medical Sales Professional and Veterinarian with over 2 years of experience in pharma-
ceutical and healthcare sales, specializing in promoting medical services and products. Proven ability to build
strong client relationships, drive sales growth, and manage operations effectively across B2C and B2B seg-
ments in multinational environments, including the UAE and Egypt. Adept at market analysis, lead conversion,
and ensuring seamless patient experience.
WORK EXPERIENCE
Sales and Operation Specialist Feb 2024 â€“ Present
City Doctor Healthcare LLC, Dubai, UAE
Cultivated and maintained robust client relationships, enhancing repeat business and significantly improving
patient retention for home healthcare services.
Drove sales of medical services (IV therapy, physiotherapy, lab tests) through expert communication and
deep product knowledge, mirroring best practices in pharmaceutical promotion.
Streamlined coordination between medical and operations teams to optimize scheduling and delivery of
home-care services, ensuring superior patient experience and service quality.
Managed high-volume customer inquiries via WhatsApp and call center, successfully converting leads, pro-
viding comprehensive service details, and executing effective up-selling strategies.
Performed comprehensive market analysis and offered strategic insights for targeted B2C and B2B promo-
tional campaigns, demonstrating proficiency in territory management.
Product Specialist Jun 2023 â€“ Jan 2024
Johnson and Johnson, Egypt
Spearheaded the promotion of ophthalmology products (e.g., artificial tears) to ophthalmologists, LASIK
centers, and hospitals.
Developed and executed sales forecasts for specific work periods and seasonal demands.
Consistently achieved periodic sales growth targets by implementing effective promotional strategies.
Conducted regular visits to key customers and medical centers, ensuring comprehensive product informa-
tion dissemination and strong client engagement.
Monitored product stock levels with stores and distributors to guarantee continuous product availability and
supply chain efficiency.
Key Account Manager Apr 2023 â€“ Jun 2023
HPG Pharma, Egypt
Managed promotion and sales of ICU & Anesthesia drugs across Upper Egypt, significantly contributing to
market penetration and revenue growth.
Engaged with veterinarians to educate on product benefits, fostering strong professional relationships and
driving product adoption.
Collaborated with doctors and pharmacies to ensure consistent product availability and optimized distribu-
tion channels.
Oversaw product distribution to UPA pharmacies and hospitals, enhancing market reach and accessibility.

Developed accurate sales forecasts and consistently achieved periodic growth targets, demonstrating
strong analytical and sales strategy skills.
Medical Sales Representative Mar 2022 â€“ Apr 2023
Multi Care Vet Pharma, Egypt
Successfully promoted a portfolio of veterinary medicines for poultry (e.g., bioxen, virocare), achieving sales
objectives.
Maintained consistent engagement with poultry consultants, providing product information and building
trust.
Conducted visits to anatomy and diagnostic laboratories, establishing relationships with key veterinary
professionals.
Managed relationships with distributors and veterinary pharmacies to ensure timely and efficient medicine
fulfillment.
Performed regular visits to poultry farms to assess needs and promote relevant veterinary solutions.
EDUCATION
Assiut University 2016 â€“ 2020
Bachelor's Degree of Veterinary Medicine (GPA: 2.7)
SKILLS
Medical Sales Pharmaceutical Sales Product Promotion Key Account Management
Sales Forecasting Market Analysis Lead Generation B2C Sales B2B Sales
Territory Management Distribution Management Upselling Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
Veterinary Medicine Healthcare Sales Ophthalmology Products ICU & Anesthesia Drugs
IV Therapy Physiotherapy Services Lab Test Services Excellent Communication Active Listening
Problem Solving Multi-tasking Time Management Flexibility & Adaptability Client Engagement
Negotiation English (Professional) Arabic (Native)
CERTIFICATIONS
Patient Focus Selling Skills (HPG Academy, 2023)
Mastering Account Management (HPG Academy, 2023)
Selling and Communication Skills Course (Johnson and Johnson, 2024)
Customer Engagement Training (Multi Care Vet, 2023)
REFERENCES
References available upon request.

Code in JavaScript5.replyMessage: I've optimized your CV for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) by structuring it into a clean, modern HTML template. This format enhances readability for both recruiters and automated systems, ensuring all your key information is easily parsed. Your professional details have been meticulously transferred and organized.
Code in JavaScript5.updatedCvHtml:
ABANOUB MOHSEN ABBAS

Medical Sales Representative | Sales and Operation Specialist

+971544416134 | abanoub.mohsen789@gmail.com | Dubai, UAE | UAE Driving License | Work Visa

Professional Summary

Highly results-driven Medical Sales Professional and Veterinarian with over 2 years of experience in pharmaceutical and healthcare sales, specializing in promoting medical services and products. Proven ability to build strong client relationships, drive sales growth, and manage operations effectively across B2C and B2B segments in multinational environments, including the UAE and Egypt.
